abstract: Verizon Wireless and AT&T announced new services that will allow customers to access a variety of social networking applications from their phones — with the prominent exception of Facebook.
snippet: Verizon Wireless and AT&T announced new services that will allow customers to access a variety of social networking applications from their phones — with the prominent exception of Facebook.
lead_paragraph: In the last few years, Verizon Wireless and AT&T have sought to court young consumers interested in keeping in touch with friends. Now they are turning their attention to everyone else.

headline.main: AT&T and Verizon Wireless Offer New Services for Friends
